title: Buildings which attract or are likely to attract a large number of people / public such as shopping malls, markets, religious buildings, monuments, places of tourist importance, business buildings having headquarters of business houses (such as the World Trade Centre, Stock Exchange) ete
clause_text: Buildings which attract or are likely to attract a large number of people / public such as shopping malls, markets, religious buildings, monuments, places of tourist importance, business buildings having headquarters of business houses (such as the World Trade Centre, Stock Exchange) ete.
